title: Plat - Mid - LFT
body:
Hi,

I, Storymaker, am looking for a 5v5 ranked Team for going competitive.

I am playing this bloody game since S2, gathered some premade 5v5 experience in S3 and wasted my time in SoloQ mostly.
Now I decided that I finally wanna go competitive.

Since I was playing lots of SoloQ I wasn't really able to focus on one specific roles, but my prefered roles are most definetly **MID** and/or **TOP**.

I am looking for an english or german speaking team that is aiming for reaching Diamond this season.

Add me ingame "Storymaker"
